name: Roots Go Down Tree Go Up
name_original: Roots Go Down Tree Go Up
description:
Instructions on How to Play

Click a root node to start growing roots or the trunk node to start growing up.

Use WASD to extend roots in different directions.

Press space to create a spit, and space or ESC to cancel the split creation.

When the tree node is selected press W to climb to the heavens and feed a starving bird.

Reach the star to produce fruit for the bird.

Click and drag or use a mouse wheel to pan the camera.

Press R to restart the current level.

Credits

Cory Martin: Programming, Design, Music, Sound, and Art.

Meghan Connor: Art, Design, Shrieking, and Whacking stuff with a hairbrush while hitting the record button.
